column1: PICK_STARTING_ERA_TEXT;Romance of the Three Kingdoms starts in 184 AD. Choose where in the timeline you want your game to start.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
BM_YELLOW_ERA_INFO;The time of the Azure sky is over! Now the Yellow Heaven shall reign on earth! Rise up against the Han! Rise up
column2: and take what is rightfully yours! -Zhang Jue\n\nDuring the reign of Emperor Ling of the Han Dynasty
column7: and taxes permeated the empire. With growing resentment
column8: and sensing the end of the Han Dynasty
column9: people from all corners of the land have risen up against the Empire.\n\nWill you fight for the Empire? Or forge your own path?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: BM_DONG_ERA_INFO;An ambitious warlord from Liang has managed to secure the Emperor and suppress the Ten Eunuchs. However
column2: his ambitions lie beyond his current station. He abuses his position and imposes his will upon both the Emperor and the court.\n\nDong Zhuo is a tyrant without equal. A beast in man's form. Even now a coalition of warlords is forming against him. Will you rise up to free the Emperor? Or will you side with the Tyrant?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: BM_WARLORD_ERA_INFO;The lords of the realm have each become kings in their own right. With the Han Dynasty existing in name only
column2: will you be the next Huangdi?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: BM_RED_ERA_INFO;Coming off the heels of his victories over the Yuan Clan
column4: Cao Cao now holds sway over all of Northern and Central China.\n\nSun Quan and Liu Bei have formed a desperate alliance against the Chancellor
column5: but against such odds they will almost surely to fail. The fate of the Empire lies along the cliffs of Chibi.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column3: §ZShu§!. Only one kingdom can rule the empire. Who will it be?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: BM_SOUTH_ERA_INFO;Local Administrators in the South have rebelled. Their  insurrection has misled the Nanman tribes to join in their revolt. Zhuge Liang has set out to defeat the enemy and crush the revolt once and for all.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: BM_SOUTH_DESC;Local Administrators in the South have rebelled. Their  insurrection has misled the Nanman tribes to join in their revolt. Zhuge Liang has set out to defeat the enemy and crush the revolt once and for all.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
ERA_CHAR_INFO_100;He Jin - Regent of the Han Dynasty\nBorn into a family of butchers
column2: He Jin's rise to power came in the form of his sister. Her position as one of Emperor Ling's favorites gauranteed He Jin a quick rise to the top of the bureaucratic ladder.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
